SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable

Class DeckCommon

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable.DeckCommon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Distributable<CommonGoalCard>
public class DeckCommon extends Object implements Distributable<CommonGoalCard>
DeckCommon is an implementation of the Distributable interface, it deals with commonCards, It can be used to draw common cards. As a factory method, it creates only the necessary cards based on a given configuration.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeckCommon

      public DeckCommon(int nPlayers, String configuration) throws PlayersNumberOutOfRange, IllegalFilePathException
      The DeckCommon constructor initialize the deck with the given attributes
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - the number of players of the actual game
      configuration - the path to the json configuration file
      Throws:
      PlayersNumberOutOfRange - if the nPlayers is less than 2 and grater than 4
      IllegalFilePathException - if the configuration string is empty

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public ArrayList<CommonGoalCard> draw(int nElements) throws NegativeFieldException, PlayersNumberOutOfRange, NotEnoughCardsException, RemoteException
      Draw method consents to draw a number of CommonGoalCard elements
      Specified by:
      draw in interface Distributable<CommonGoalCard>
      Parameters:
      nElements - the number of elements to draw
      Returns:
      an ArrayList that contains the drawn elements
      Throws:
      NegativeFieldException - if the nElements is negative
      PlayersNumberOutOfRange - if the number of players is less than 2 or grater than 4
      NotEnoughCardsException - if the number of the cards read from the JSON file is less than the required cards with nElements
      RemoteException - RMI Exception
